title: Whiskeytown National Recreation Area: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia           Curious what's happening on the lake today? Check out the park webcam! This camera is located on the roof of the park visitor center and looks west over Whiskeytown Lake.  Made possible, in part, by Whiskeytown Sailing Club, through a generous donation to the Friends of Whiskeytown.                      NPS Centennial   5 Photos  Media-quality images of Whiskeytown National Recreation Area for the 2016 National Park Service Centennial.                                     NPS Centennial   5 Photos  Media-quality images of Whiskeytown National Recreation Area for the 2016 National Park Service Centennial.
